level.heading: Candidate's liability for financial obligation incurred by political committee.
Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 401(d) of Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Establishment and Comprehensive Ethics Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-298, January 29, 2012, 59 DCR 683).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-101
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-1101.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-124
level.text: For history of Law 19-124, see notes under § 1-1101.
